question: What is the main objective of the Mo School Campaign launched in Odisha?
option1: To provide Rs. 10000 scholarship to students
option2: To provide cash prize to the best performing schools
option3: To felicitate teachers with cash prize
answer: To provide cash prize to the best performing schools
explanation: The Mo School Campaign of Odisha was aimed at providing cash prize of a total of 1 lakh to the best performing schools. It was launched in 2018 (1st January).
